name: Trover Saves the Universe
content:
files:
- master.zip: https://github.com/z0z0z/mf-install/archive/master.zip
- SteamSetup.exe: https://steamcdn-a.akamaihd.net/client/installer/SteamSetup.exe
game:
  appid: '1051200'
  arch: win64
  args: -nojoy -applaunch 1051200
  custom-name: Trover Saves the Universe
  exe: $GAMEDIR/prefix/drive_c/Program Files (x86)/Steam/Steam.exe
  prefix: $GAMEDIR/prefix
installer:
- task:
    arch: win64
    description: Creating 64-bit prefix ...
    name: create_prefix
    prefix: $GAMEDIR/prefix
- execute:
    command: mkdir "$GAMEDIR/prefix/mediafoundation_workaround"
    description: Creating Media Foundation workaround directory ...
- write_file:
    content: cd $HOME/Games/trover-saves-the-universe/prefix/mediafoundation_workaround
      && WINEPREFIX="$HOME/Games/trover-saves-the-universe/prefix" ./mf-install.sh
    description: Creating install.sh with prefix ...
    file: $GAMEDIR/prefix/mediafoundation_workaround/install.sh
- chmodx: $GAMEDIR/prefix/mediafoundation_workaround/install.sh
- extract:
    description: Extracting Media Foundation workaround ...
    dst: $GAMEDIR/prefix/mediafoundation_workaround
    file: master.zip
- execute:
    command: sh $GAMEDIR/prefix/mediafoundation_workaround/install.sh
    description: Media Foundation workaround ...
- move:
    dst: $GAMEDIR/prefix/drive_c/
    src: SteamSetup.exe
- chmodx: $GAMEDIR/prefix/drive_c/SteamSetup.exe
- task:
    app: d3drm
    arch: win64
    description: DirectX ...
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR/prefix
- task:
    app: d3dcompiler_43
    arch: win64
    description: DirectX 11 ...
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR/prefix
- task:
    app: d3dx11_43
    arch: win64
    description: DirectX 11 ...
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR/prefix
- task:
    app: d3dcompiler_47
    arch: win64
    description: DirectX compiler ...
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR/prefix
- task:
    app: dxvk
    arch: win64
    description: Vulkan ...
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR/prefix
- task:
    args: /S
    description: Steam ...
    executable: $GAMEDIR/prefix/drive_c/SteamSetup.exe
    name: wineexec
    prefix: $GAMEDIR/prefix
- task:
    app: win8
    arch: win64
    description: Windows version 8 ...
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR/prefix
system:
  disable_compositor: true
  pulse_latency: true
  xboxdrv: xboxdrv
wine:
  Audio: pulse
  dxvk: true
  esync: true
